XIII.i.3.C.1.d
.
VHA Requests for 38 U.S.C. 1702 Determinations
The table below describes the process when VHA requests a VBA determination ofÂ SC under
38 U.S.C. 1702
.
Stage
Description
1
VHA submits requests for determination of SC accompanied by
a copy of a completed
VA Form 10-10EZ, Application for Health Benefits
, or
VA Form 10-10EZR, Health Benefits Update Form
, and
VA Form 10-10M, Medical Certificate
, and
any other available professional report submitted with, or developed in conjunction with, the application for hospital or outpatient treatment.
2
Follow the procedure for processing a request for rating activity action in
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, 3.A
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C - Service Connection (SC) for Mental Conditions for Treatment Purposes Under 38 U.S.C. 1702
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C
